questions.question: This is the first - and only - hackerspace in Winnipeg
Winnipeg officially became a city in this year (the same year that Manitoba became a province)
The Northwest Company built this fort, which was re-built in 1978 by the Festival du Voyageur
This ship is the featured exhibit at the Manitoba Museum
This is Winnipeg's motto (Latin or English are fine)
questions.answer: "Unum Cum Virtute Multorum" (One with the Strength of Many)
